## Some example of interactive maps
*Compiled from [Planetizen](https://www.planetizen.com/tag/interactive-maps)*

Look through some of the interactive maps listed below? What are the authors of each trying to achieve? How effective are these maps? How could they be more effective?

[Vacant and underutilized land in Miami-Dade County](http://land.ccs.miami.edu/explore/parcels){target="_blank"}

[Forecasting telework](http://septa.nittany-ai-associates.com/){target="_blank"}

[Assessing economic development](http://evatool.oregonmetro.gov/){target="_blank"}

[Transit ridership trends](https://insights.transitcenter.org/){target="_blank"}

[Potential impacts of upzoning near transit (SB 50)](http://upzoning.berkeley.edu/station_neighborhoods.html){target="_blank"}

[Inequities in air pollution exposure](https://www.ucsusa.org/resources/inequitable-exposure-air-pollution-vehicles-california-2019){target="_blank"}

[Flood risk](https://headwaterseconomics.org/apps/neighborhoods-at-risk/){target="_blank"}

[Neighborhood change](https://www.jchs.harvard.edu/boston-neighborhood-change-interactive-map#/boston-map/recommended-maps){target="_blank"}
